mapper.sql: userName, userGender, userNickName, userEmail, userPwd, userPN, userSchool, userAddress, userSocial, userSocialId, emailHash, emailcertification, userImage, userRegDate, userAd, userRegTime, userInfoType, role
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo() VALUES( #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userNickName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPwd}, #{userPN}, '-', '-', '-', '-', #{emailHash}, '0', 'images/profile.svg', NOW(), #{userAd}, NOW(), '일반', 'USER' )

INSERT INTO userinfo() VALUES( #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userNickName}, #{userEmail}, '-', #{userPN}, '-', '-', '-', #{userSocialId}, '-', #{emailcertification}, #{userImage}, NOW(), '0', NOW(), #{userInfoType}, #{role} )
mapper.select: SELECT userEmail, userRegDate, userInfoType FROM userinfo WHERE userName = #{userName} and userNickName = #{userNickName} and role = 'USER'
SELECT userPwd, userInfoType FROM userinfo WHERE userEmail = #{userEmail} and role = 'USER'
SELECT userEmail,userNickName,userImage FROM userinfo WHERE userEmail !=#{userEmail} order by rand() limit 5

SELECT userName, userNickName, userEmail, userSocialId, userPN, userAddress, emailcertification, userInfoType, userRegDate FROM userinfo WHERE userName LIKE concat ('%', #{userName}, '%') and role = 'USER'
SELECT postId, userEmail, likeNum, imageName, videoName, shareNum, commentNum, creationDate, postReport FROM post WHERE userEmail LIKE concat ('%', #{userEmail}, '%')
SELECT userEmail FROM userinfo WHERE userAd = 1 and userEmail LIKE concat ('%', #{userEmail}, '%')
SELECT userPN FROM userinfo WHERE userAd = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sms(userPN, content, userRegTime) VALUES( #{setPhone}, #{setContent}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT userPN, content, userRegTime FROM sms ORDER BY userRegTime DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userinfo WHERE MONTH(userRegTime) = #{month} AND YEAR(userRegTime) = 2023
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE MONTH(creationDate) = #{month} AND YEAR(creationDate) = 2023
SELECT postId, userEmail, likeNum, shareNum, commentNum, postReport FROM post ORDER BY likeNum desc LIMIT 5
SELECT userEmail, COUNT(*) as count FROM post GROUP BY userEmail ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM post
